title: Mona Lisa
shortDescription: A portrait painting by Leonardo da Vinci, one of the most famous works of art.
description: The Mona Lisa is renowned for the enigmatic expression on the subject's face and the atmospheric quality of the background. It has been part of the Louvre collection since 1797.

title: The Starry Night
shortDescription: A famous painting by Vincent van Gogh, depicting a swirling night sky.
description: The Starry Night portrays Van Gogh's view from his asylum room, characterized by the bold brush strokes and the emotional intensity that mark his work.

title: The Persistence of Memory
shortDescription: A surreal painting by Salvador Dal√≠, featuring melting clocks.
description: The Persistence of Memory represents the fluidity of time in a dreamlike landscape, and it has become one of the most iconic works of surrealism.

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
shortDescription: A famous painting by Johannes Vermeer, often called the 'Mona Lisa of the North.'
description: This portrait, painted by Vermeer, captures a girl turning towards the viewer with a captivating expression, highlighted by her luminous pearl earring.
